About the game: Game features: Candy is the food that brings happiness. And here is the world of candy! For the teeth that were eaten by sugar in those years, I respect you ~ don't complain when you leave ( Life without sugar. What's the difference between that and salted fish If you get drunk today, two bags of wow are not expensive! Oh, let a man of spirit venture where he pleases, are two bags of rainbow sour? Mochow has no bosom friend in the road ahead, and the Alps will not give it to you! Xiaohe only shows sharp corners, and the big white rabbit is indispensable ~ Have you ever wondered where delicious candy comes from? A variety of raw materials, a variety of processes, rich variety of candy. Make lovely candy with your own hands, and attract guests with delicious candy! The game is very Buddhist as a whole, collecting the pigment for making candy, and then memorizing the recipe for making candy. According to the formula, produce candy and then sell it in your own small shop With the development of collecting resources, unlock more illustrations: Here you can see the other side of candy and listen to the story behind them. Unique appearance, interesting stories and sweets accompanied by surprises are the best! Game introduction: The life of sugar is amazing. First, carefully select all kinds of high-quality ingredients, then melt, boil, cool and reconcile, shape, select and package. Each candy must go through layers of hardships to become a delicious candy in our hands. In the game, you will play the role of making candy, and make healthy, sweet and delicious candy at every level Message: All the sweets we eat are sweet and great because they melt ourselves and sweet our hearts. When you are unhappy, depressed and depressed, you might as well eat a sweet candy, which will bring us happiness and sweetness and make us recover. For the teeth that were eaten by sugar in those years, I respect you ~ don't complain when you leave ( Life without sugar. What's the difference between that and salted fish Make candy to relive the taste of childhood
